bcbioRnaseq
  • Reference

Plot Mean Average

Plot Mean Average

plot_ma(object, ...)

# S4 method for DESeqResults
plot_ma(object, ...)

# S4 method for data.frame
plot_ma(object, ...)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
label_points

Optional. Label these particular points.
label_column

Match label_points argument to this column in the results.
point_color_scale

Point color scale. See ggplot2::color_manual for more information.
label_color

Text label color.
title

Optional. Plot title.

Value

ggplot.

See also

Other Differential Expression Plots: plot_volcano

Examples

data(bcb)
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromTximport(
    txi = txi(bcb),
    colData = colData(bcb),
    design = formula(~group)) %>%
    DESeq
#> using just counts from tximport
#> estimating size factors
#> estimating dispersions
#> gene-wise dispersion estimates
#> mean-dispersion relationship
#> final dispersion estimates
#> fitting model and testing
res <- results(dds)

genes <- c("ENSMUSG00000104523", "ENSMUSG00000016918")

# DESeqResults
plot_ma(res, label_points = genes)
#> Error in eval(lhs, parent, parent): object 'res' not found

# data.frame
res_df <- as.data.frame(res)
plot_ma(res_df, label_points = genes)
